text:
Matan Tzemach, age 16, gets his first dose of the #COVID19 #vaccine. Israel has put youth aged 16-18 in an approved category for vaccination. When asked why he got the vaccine, Matan answered, "All my friends are getting vaccinated."

(Photo by Eitan Elhadez-Barak/TPS) https://t.co/GWIKSY2woo
